```{r echo = F, warning = F, results = 'asis'}
  yr_mean <- summaryBy( Jan + Feb + Mar + Apr + May + Jun + Jul + Aug + Sep + Oct + Nov + Dec ~ Year, 
	data=g, FUN=mean)
	colnames(yr_mean) <- c("Year", "avg")

	g <- cbind(g, yr_mean$avg)
  names(g)[names(g)=="yr_mean$avg"] <- "avg"
	g$ix <- seq.int(nrow(g))
	g$ixsq <- seq.int(nrow(g)) * seq.int(nrow(g))

  fit <- lm(avg ~ ix, data=g)
  fit_xsq <- lm(avg ~ ix + ixsq, data=g)
```

```{r verbatim = TRUE}
summary(fit)
```
